item.description:
Current Good Manufacturing Practices: Training for the Biotechnology Industry by MassBio
When: Wednesday, November 17, from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.
Where: MassBio Offices
One Cambridge Center, 9th Floor
Cambridge, MA 02141
Website: https://secure.massbi...
Are you in compliance with the FDA requirements for GMP training? The FDA requires manufacturers (even those in clinical trials) to have their employees trained on the GMP regulations with retraining on a continuing basis so that each employee remains familiar with the GMP requirements. This training will provide participants with an understanding of how the 211 regulations relate to their functions, and thus allow manufacturers to remain in compliance with the FDA.
item.name: Current Good Manufacturing Practices: Training for the Biotechnology Industry
